short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ReddyFilter hides Reddit posts with whatever keywords you specify.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Want to cut clutter from your Reddit feed? Tired of seeing posts that are irrelevant to you or that you don't care about? ReddyFilter is here for you! Specify keywords for ReddyFilter to look for, and it will hide Reddit posts with those keywords in their titles.
